answers.answer: Hello.The first question I would like to ask is about your blood sugar levels. Do you have them under control ? If you get them controlled, the diabetic neuropathy should not progress. The symptoms you are experiencing are probably due to that.Regards

question: i have diabetes about 3 years ago i started to have burning pain all over my body it is worsened when i sleep. i am on lyrica 150 mgs twice a day  it dosen't help much they had me on oxy. at 40 mgs twice a day that worked but this is a dead end street for my due to my body tolerance to it. i have been to many specialist know results.can you help?
title: burning pain
